mapper.insert: insert into board (class_idx, user_idx, bo_title, bo_content, bo_isnotice, bo_role) values(#{class_idx},#{user_idx}, #{bo_title}, #{bo_content}, #{bo_isnotice}, #{bo_role})
mapper.select: select class_idx, user_idx, bo_title, bo_content, bo_writedate, bo_isnotice, bo_role from board where bo_idx = #{bo_idx}
select class_idx, user_idx, bo_title, bo_content, bo_writedate, bo_isnotice, bo_role from board where bo_idx > 0 order by bo_idx desc
